title: Issue with logging on with an iMac
body: When logging on using the new client, it will sometimes just say 'Authenticating' or if it lets me log in as soon as im in a window will pop up saying 'Attempting to Reconnonect'. I have good internet and never had any issues with any other game, internet wise.2

replies.body: It looks like we're still having a few login issues currently, but techs have figured out the main issue and are still working on smoothing that out. You can always stay updated by checking up on the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).
